name: Robusto
additionalNotes:
Prida Bundled Cigars

This is a uniquely blended cigar, containing fine tobacco from various origins, mixed in a perfect blend which offers consistency and continuity. The Connecticut wrapper finishes this cigar, a perfect tobacco color and excellent fine and even burn. The cigar good strength and fine aroma.
http://www.cvmcigars.com/c-315-prida-bundles.aspx
